value.name: Raw Surveillance Video Shows Moment Chicago Teen Was Shot
value.description: Raw video from an automatic surveillance camera in Chicago shows a police officer drawing his gun near the location where 17-year-old Cedrick Chatman was shot. Another officer actually shot him ...
